message: I propose dividing the $10,000 with a 75/25 split in favor of Alice. This allows us both to have a fair share while considering the decreasing value of money in subsequent rounds.

I'm willing to compromise and give you a slightly larger share, but I think 75/25 is too extreme. I propose a 60/40 split, which still gives you a significant advantage while also considering the decreasing value of money.
